name: SOCIAL FINANCE, INC.
sampleDescriptions: Tax treatment of student loan repayment assistance, including H.R.795, the "Employer Participation in Student Loan Assistance Act," H.R.1656, the "HELP for Students and Parents Act," S.796, the "Employer Participation in Repayment Act of 2017," and H.R.4508, the "PROSPER Act."
